thread.title: Fmr. Gopher Tubby Smith to receive coaching honor

title: Fmr. Gopher Tubby Smith to receive coaching honor
text:
Fmr. Gopher Tubby Smith to receive coaching honor Texas Tech's Tubby Smith will receive the John R. Wooden Award's Legends of Coaching honor in April. Post to Facebook Fmr. Gopher Tubby Smith to receive coaching honor Texas Tech's Tubby Smith will receive the John R. Wooden Award's Legends of Coaching honor in April. Check out this story on kare11.com: http://www.kare11.com/story/sports/college/minnesota/golden-gophers/2015/10/13/legends-of-coaching-award-going-to-fmr-gopher-tubby-smith/73890282/ Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Fmr. Gopher Tubby Smith to receive coaching honor Associated Press, Associated Press 5:49 p.m. EDT October 13, 2015 Tubby Smith coaching the Minnesota Golden Gophers. (Photo: KARE 11) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
LOS ANGELES (AP) - Texas Tech's Tubby Smith will receive the John R. Wooden Award's Legends of Coaching honor in April. 
The annual award recognizes coaches who exemplify Wooden's standards of coaching success and personal integrity. 
Smith will receive the award at the ESPN College Basketball Awards show in Los Angeles on April 8. 
He is 538-263 in 24 years as a head coach at Texas Tech, Minnesota, Kentucky, Georgia and Tulsa. He won a national championship at Kentucky in 1998, and has made four Elite Eight appearances, had nine Sweet 16 berths and posted 20 or more wins in 19 seasons while making 17 NCAA Tournament appearances. 
Among previous winners of the award are Tara VanDerveer of Stanford, Roy Williams of Kansas, Mike Krzyzewski of Duke and Dean Smith of North Carolina.
